name: iPhone 11
description: The iPhone 11 features a dual-camera system, A13 Bionic chip, and an all-day battery life.

name: iPhone 12
description: The iPhone 12 comes with 5G capability, Super Retina XDR display, and Ceramic Shield front cover.

name: iPhone 12 Mini
description: The iPhone 12 Mini is a compact version of iPhone 12, with a 5.4-inch display and all the features of iPhone 12.

name: iPhone 12 Pro
description: The iPhone 12 Pro features a Pro camera system, LiDAR scanner, and A14 Bionic chip for professional-level performance.

name: iPhone 12 Pro Max
description: The iPhone 12 Pro Max offers the largest display ever on an iPhone, along with advanced camera features and superior performance.

name: iPhone SE
description: The iPhone SE packs the power of the A13 Bionic chip into the size of the iPhone 8, offering great value with familiar design.

name: iPhone 11 Pro
description: The iPhone 11 Pro features a triple-camera system, Super Retina XDR display, and A13 Bionic chip for incredible performance.

name: iPhone 11 Pro Max
description: The iPhone 11 Pro Max offers the same features as iPhone 11 Pro with a larger display, providing an immersive experience.

name: iPhone XR
description: The iPhone XR features a Liquid Retina display, A12 Bionic chip, and advanced Face ID for a fast and secure user experience.

name: iPhone XS
description: The iPhone XS features a Super Retina display, dual-camera system, and A12 Bionic chip for exceptional performance and photography.

name: iPhone XS Max
description: The iPhone XS Max features the largest display ever on an iPhone, along with the same features as iPhone XS, providing a premium experience.

name: iPhone 8
description: The iPhone 8 features a Retina HD display, A11 Bionic chip, and wireless charging capability for a convenient and powerful user experience.

name: iPhone 8 Plus
description: The iPhone 8 Plus features a larger Retina HD display, dual-camera system, and A11 Bionic chip for enhanced performance and photography.

name: iPhone 7
description: The iPhone 7 features a Retina HD display, A10 Fusion chip, and water resistance for a reliable and efficient smartphone experience.

name: iPhone 7 Plus
description: The iPhone 7 Plus features a larger Retina HD display, dual-camera system, and A10 Fusion chip for powerful performance and photography.
